sqlMap.select: SELECT EKA.LST_TABLE.LSTAB_VALUE FROM EKA.LST_TABLE WHERE ( EKA.LST_TABLE.LSTAB_JENIS = 2 ) AND ( EKA.LST_TABLE.LSBS_ID = 180) AND ( EKA.LST_TABLE.LKU_ID = '01' ) AND ( EKA.LST_TABLE.LSCB_ID = 3 ) AND ( EKA.LST_TABLE.LSTAB_LAMA_BAYAR = 10 ) AND ( EKA.LST_TABLE.LSTAB_LAMA_TANGGUNG = 10 ) AND ( EKA.LST_TABLE.LSTAB_TAHUN_KE = #liTahunKe# ) AND ( EKA.LST_TABLE.LSTAB_AGE = #liUsia# )
